sentences.en: They were incinerating hazardous waste without a licence.
sentences.cn: 他们没有许可就把危险废弃物烧成灰烬。

sentences.en: The report calls for a ban on the import of hazardous waste.
sentences.cn: 这篇报道呼吁禁止危险废弃物的进口。

sentences.en: They have no way to dispose of the hazardous waste they produce.
sentences.cn: 他们没法处理那些由他们制造出来的危害性废弃物。
